Relazione a convegno internazionale all'estero: Gravelle H., Masiero G., 2001. “Regulation in the market for primary care when quality is a private good”. In: Conference Proceedings, 1st International Conference of French Health Economists: L’Etat de la Réforme, Paris 3-4 February 2000.
